website_summaries.verdict: Built to last, this quality cookware will be a long term addition to any kitchen.
pros: This aesthetically pleasing set is available in a variety of colors
Made from durable materials with a good amount of weight to them
Handles have a soft but sturdy grip
With proper care, the color will remain vibrant with no burn damage or stains
Never soak and scrub again, a simple wipe down with soap and hot water will have these pans shiny and clean
Food is cooked evenly without the need of butter or oil
cons: This set sits at a slightly higher price point than its competitors

website_summaries.verdict: A wide assortment of pots, pans, and everyday utensils.
pros: Lots of pluses like being made without the use of PFOA (perfluorooctanoic acid), a known carcinogen
Twice as hard as stainless steel
cons: The large pans are on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: This set is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I am so pissed! This set is an overpriced cheap piece of crap. The bottom of the pan completely melted through ruining not only the pan but my stove top as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless, don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had this set for a year and I am ready to toss it out! I received for my birthday in November 2017 and it is completely stained on the out side. We hand wash them so that the color won't fade, but the quality is so poor. I wish I could return the whole set and get our money back. Really disappointed, not sure how Rachael Ray allows her name to be added to such a cheaply made item.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Salvat

customer_reviews.title: Initially I loved this set
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this set. I never put in the dish washer and took very good care of it. Pieces of the inside of the pot was found inside of my food. I had to throw away 3 pieces. Beautiful color but I can't have pieces of pot and pans in my food.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write this review because I'd had other enamel cookware before (a different brand) that I initially loved, but as I used it, it quickly became very scorched looking on the bottom. Since I display my cookware on hooks in my kitchen, this was very unsightly. Well, I've been cooking with my beautiful Rachael Ray Agave Blue enamel cookware for nearly four months and it's still as lovely as the day I took it out of the box. It's as functional as it is beautiful. I highly recommend the cookware and will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bitsy C :-)

customer_reviews.title: Glass Lid Exploded
customer_reviews.text: This weekend, under normal use, while on a pan of simmering pasta, I went to pick up the lid and the handle came off in my hand and the glass lied exploded. I had shards of glass in my hand, all over my kitchen, and who know how long I'll be finding them.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE PANS!!!! These pans are okay, the color faded and the enamel lost its luster after two months use. Update on these horrible pans, no luster or shine, lids no longer fit, pans are warped. THE WORST PANS I HAVE EVER OWNED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This product just got here and understand that I just pick it up from UPS then when I opened it, the big pan is mess up, the lid cannot even seat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Balichrov Dessalines

customer_reviews.title: Don't scratch your wife's pans
customer_reviews.text: Wife enjoyed them. I scratched one cutting pork chops in the actual pan.... Don't do that, for the love of all that's holy.
customer_reviews.author: Terryn

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL WORKMANSHIP
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set brand new less than three weeks ago and haven't even used most of the set. This particular skillet has not been used at all. The coating is literally peeling away from the top edge. I've had higher quality dime store cookware. I'm within my return window and will be initiating a return immediately. I'm glad we didn't throw away our old stuff yet.
customer_reviews.author: CoMoMama

customer_reviews.title: they are very beautiful, and had a good price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these on a sale, they are very beautiful, and had a good price. After the first use the bottom and side with the beautiful blue color began to stain and turns brown. Making them absolutely awful looking, and the enamel scratched very easily. We returned these due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stout

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set since 2015 and it’s atill holding up despite having a husband who doesn’t take proper care of them. As long as you don’t use metal utensils while cooking and wash by hand, I’m sure they’ll last a lifetime. However, even with my husband using metal spatulas and mixing his macaroni with a FORK and running these through the dish washer, they’re still in good shape with minor damage. However, DO NOT DROP THEM. I dropped the large skillet from the counter on the floor and it dented the side in so the lid doesn’t fit right.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: They have been a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: coating peeled off after one month. It was replaced under warranty but I had to pay to ship it back. I have not put the pans in the dishwasher or oven and they are not holding up. They have been a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dino

customer_reviews.title: Instead I use my grandma's stainless steel pans and they work much better. If you can afford it
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy these and make the mistake I did. The colour faded quickly but that is not my main concern. Whilst cooking, small black flakes from the inside of the pan mixed in with my food one night. It's so gross I can't even bring myself to use these pans anymore. Surely that black stuff is harmful to our bodies. I've got 2 little kids and couldn't take the risk. Instead I use my grandma's stainless steel pans and they work much better. If you can afford it, buy stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: caroline barrie

customer_reviews.title: Excessive gap between lid and Pot
customer_reviews.text: 201801 Have had it for less than a month. Noticed that three out of four pots have significant gap between the lid and pot (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, works great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these well over a month so far and I am impressed. I’ve tried pioneer women twice and they were awful, so I was unsure about buying a new set online. They distribute heat REALLY well, and are so easy to wash. They don’t show any wear and tear despite my husband using metal silverware to cook a few times without thinking. I put one or two pots/pans in the dishwasher daily, and it hasn’t effected them so far. Besides having cast iron, I recommend these for the ease of daily use/cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Explosions hurt!
customer_reviews.text: Just recently got this and love it. However, after using the large lid, I placed it on my countertop and it exploded sending shards everywhere. Tried contacting amazon and they don’t see to care. Don’t know how to contact the the seller so it’s getting a 3 star until someone can actually help me.
customer_reviews.author: James Balestrini

customer_reviews.title: Great pans, bad reviews clearly are not use/caring for these as instructed!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review until we used all the pots and pans multiple times. These are great, easy to clean, durable and are a nice shade of purple! Follow the instructions and you will have no problems. Would purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: This rating is strictly based on appearance. We received this cookware set this past weekend and upon opening, we discovered that the stock pot was significantly dented. I filed a warranty claim and the woman I spoke with stated this item was no longer in stock but would be replaced with a similar item. I'm a little bummed about that but don't feel like repacking the entire set and returning. As for the appearance of the remaining set it looks really nice. My husband even commented on how good the set looked. We purchased the sea salt grey. I'll update this review after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my Mom's birthday, they haven't fallen apart yet.
customer_reviews.text: Asked her what she would like. She said tephlon cookware. Then asked specifically for a set of Rachael Ray purple cookware with a set silicon utensils to accompany it. She's had them for nearly a year. I asked her how they were holding up for her last week as I was looking to buy a cookware set of my own. She said that she hasn't had any issues with them but, that if I were to buy them I need to make sure to use silicon utensils so I don't scratch the coating off of the inside of the pans.
customer_reviews.author: Wafflegasm

customer_reviews.title: Stain with gas stove tops and inside of pan chips
customer_reviews.text: The pans are nice and I suppose are easy to clean with a good scrubbing but we use a gas stovetop and man did it destroy the outside of the pans. They are stained and nothing gets it off. We also had to throw away the smaller pan that comes in this set because the inside of the pan started chipping away and we didn't want to be eating that with our food. We have always hand scrubbed these pots and pans and never put them in the dishwasher. They are OK. Expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Grimes

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I was dissatisfied. The color is not as described in the description. The "cranberry red" is a very dull "red". The color advertised is considered false advertisement. It does not matter if everything else about these pots and pans are good. We paid for the durability of this product as well as the color description. The whole ordeal ruined my excitement of getting new pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Okay for first home but not much else
customer_reviews.text: The spatulas are really cheap. they say heat resistant but they melted the first time my husband and I used them. The pots and pans work well but I will say I've already noticed discoloration and wear on them and it's not even been 2 full months yet, so honestly you are better off buying a different set. I feel like my cheaper pans are better quality and you're just paying for the name with these. The color is super nice though, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree Albro

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: We needed a basic set of pots and pans for quick and easy meals with the kids. My expectation is for the set to last about a year. Average quality at an average price. We use our Calphalon set for preparing big meals. Pros No quality imperfections Pans heat evenly Handle construction is strong and exceeded my expectation Non stick coating is great...eggs slide right off. Cons Pot walls are thin Takes longer than my previous pots to boil water Used one pan 8 to 10 tines and exterior coating is already starting to change color in a few spots Set does not have a 12" pan
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this entire set, the first use resulted in scratches and chipped coating. The only utensil I used while cooking was a wooden spoon and a spatula that came with the set. Very disappointed We have had several other cookware by Rachel ray and loved them however, this particlar set was a complete bust and sad that I am unable to return and get my money back. Manufacture said scratches and ships are not included in warranty
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E. Chisamore

customer_reviews.title: Large pan way too small
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the pans. I love the color and they work great. I’m only giving it three stars because of the fact that the deep pan with a lid is SO SMALL!!!! I did see other reviews saying the same thing and decided to get them anyways. We are only a family of 3 and I will need to purchase a much larger pan for making big meals. Also I have an electric stove and never have it on too hot and the bottom of the frying pan has a brown burn spot and it really shouldn’t!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect except for two design problems.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this set except for two design problems. Firstly the screws that attach the handles to the pans and pots are not coated on the inside so they are difficult to clean around. Secondly on the pots the handle only has plastic coating on 60% of it and either side of that plastic has metal which gets super hot. My wife has burned her hands a few times on them. Other than that they are a great size for a 2-4 person family, really easy to clean and distribute heat very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Sooo disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo disappointed in this set. I had been searching for a non stick set at a good value for a while. I was pleased with the brand, color and look and I had high hopes. It seems it is easy to scape the non stick surface though I am very vigilant about not using metal- maybe someone else in my house did it. But the worse part is that a couple of the skillets and a pot took a tumble and got bent😣. I have had this for 3 months at I am really done. I will be saving for a nicer set.
customer_reviews.author: TL Williams-Boucher

customer_reviews.title: color is beautiful has all the pots/pans the average cook needs in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: color is beautiful has all the pots/pans the average cook needs in the day-to-day running of the kitchen non-stick really is and works as expected. Cons: IT IS NOT DISHWASHER SAFE. It's stll aluminum. Great for budget, not so much for health long term
customer_reviews.author: Engltchr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One wash in the dishwasher turned it from red to pink! Disappointed to say the least! Don't even know who to call, Rachel Ray is not cheap cookware and to have it turn pink in n the very first washing! These hang off a $300 lighted ceiling pot hanger, and now have a pink one hanging! Totally disgusted with this set; and is not what I thought is not what I thought I ordered! I've emailed the company and no reply! Never thought I'd have such terrible service with Rachael Ray!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... no shattered lids or any issues of any sort like all rachel ray pots they aren't meant to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Several months I have had them no and no color change no shattered lids or any issues of any sort like all rachel ray pots they aren't meant to go over medium heat or be washed in a dish washer if you stick to this they last forever! They also go in the oven up to 350 I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley J

customer_reviews.title: Great cookware set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I received my cookware set this past Sunday. I was very pleased when I opened the box and saw how sturdy this cookware set is. I ordered the cranberry red set and it's a very nice color. I cooked with it the same day with no issues. Yesterday I cooked using the sauce pan with the lid and everything was good. The price was great and I would recommend buying this set. As long as you take care of it you will have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: That'sThis product.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use them. In fact this is only the second time I've used the skillet. I've used the large sauce pan 3 times. We basically bought them for the color and I have been saving them for when we remodel our kitchen. It's one thing to need to hand wash it's something very different when you sautee crab at 275 degrees on a clean glass top stove and this oily crap oozes out of the hinges, staining the pan. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: terri a.

customer_reviews.title: And I absolutely love these pans
customer_reviews.text: This set was a Christmas set from my husband. And I absolutely love these pans, and will continue to buy Rachel Ray Cookware. They are all light weight, heat evenly, and have done a great job with cooking anything that I have made. They are extremely easy to clean after use, it says they are dishwasher safe, but I don't ever put pots or pans in the dishwasher, so I wouldn't know. The bendable spatula that comes with the set has become my new favorite spatula in the kitchen. I would highly recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Decent but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going through reviews and trying to find a affordable set of pot and pans that was decent quality, these seemed middle of the road. I was disappointed with them though. They aren’t any better than sets I have bought that didn’t have Rachel rays name on them for less money. My last set was a ceramic coated set that I paid $75 for. To me this set really isn’t any better and your kind of paying for a name here. These aren’t bad and work well but they are over priced in my view.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Very Durable! (Buy Lavender!)
customer_reviews.text: It has been about 3 months since I have bought them and there have been no issues with the non-stick coating. I do not use a dish washer to wash them. I had scrub them with a normal non-scratch sponges. My girlfriend and I both agree the heat distribution is very good and cooks evenly. I chose the Lavender set for one main reason. After looking at all the reviews, it seems majority of the complaints are from those that purchased Teal, Red, and Orange. Not saying correlation is causation but there are almost no negative reviews from users that bought Lavender.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.text: This set is definitely worth the money. Very beautiful, and sturdy handles. I don't have to use cooking spray, because nothing sticks to these babies. Very easy clean up as well!
customer_reviews.author: CourtMader

customer_reviews.title: I love this cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware set. I bought it to replace my 20 yr old set. They are deep and nothing sticks to them. Clean up is a breeze. The silicone handles stay cool with no parts to break off or come loose .They are also very well made with rivets that won't come loose. I use them everyday for breakfast to dinner prep. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but good for light use
customer_reviews.text: These arent quite what I expected (my fault for not being more thorough). I previously bought some from these company that were much heavier and more durable that these, so I wrongfully assumed I was getting the same thing. Lesson learned. They're okay for light use though. I hardly use pots though, I do alot more baking and grilling, so I can tolerate them.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received the cookware in October. I was so excited to have a set of Rachel Ray cookware. Although I received them in October I did not use them until December and I still haven’t used all of them. I used the deepest skillet one time and went to use it the other day and noticed that around the rim the coating is peeling from the top down. I also noticed that one of my lids has a dent in the metal part so it will not seat on the pans. I am very disappointed at this point. I expected for this cookware to be a much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great!
customer_reviews.text: These are SERIOUSLY non-stick. Burnt on two day tomato sauce comes off with a quick blast of hot water and a sponge. The rubber handles are a great feature. Love that they can go into the oven as well -- I used the large deep skillet for a Spanish tortilla and it came out perfectly. One note, handles will still be too hot to touch if it comes out of the oven even with the rubber. I knocked down one star because I have found that the coating on the outside of the pots is not extremely durable and has a handful of seemingly permanent marks (scratched of burners, some staining, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: I'm in Lurve!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely ADORE this set. I replaced my old set with these when I moved into my new place and absolutely adore them! They are a good quality both the pots and pans as well as the baking pans that are included with the set I purchased. I honestly can't wait to start cooking in these little bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Monika S

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter. First set that was sent was returned as handle had chipped the enamel of one pot during packaging. Received second set and still just shabby quality. One of the pots leak and another one is not fully coated up the side of the pot. Pretty color, but Rachel Ray could have done better with manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: jojoreader

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We needed new pots and pans and my favorite color ( KJ/wife) is purple so the hubs (Alan) ordered these. He does most of the cooking and has been very pleased with these. They heat up nice, cook evenly and are easy to clean. We will see as we use them more how durable they are but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Musielewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Easy to clean and hard to destroy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these over 3 years ago and they appl work great. The color faded due to putting them in the dishwasher, teenagers being lazy. They clean very very easy. No need to put then in the dishwasher. I actually left the pot on the stove set on low all night with tea and sugar, woke up to a hard candy coated pot. Added water to soak and the pot was still im perfect condition. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: This is a Good Cookware Set. Our Color was Not as Described. More of a Faded Red/Pink.
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set is decent. The color was not as pictured, and is more of a faded red/pink. The non-stick surface works well. We only hand-wash our pans and we do not use metal utensils. The Spatula is pretty flimsy and not worth getting. The overall quality is good. They have a good construction and I figure they will last for a good 2-3 years with easy use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ada.

customer_reviews.title: Through cooking & Easy Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this set, wish color would have been lil darker but thats a personal decor choice BUT, I bought another set from another brand and hated the end result of my cooked item, I gave that set to my neice, she don't know any better yet, LOL I have at main house a stainless steel Wolfgang Puck set that I love and here I didn't want to invest the same money for temporary usage while here. I am soo very pleased!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Co Evans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I use to use the Paula Dean pans, when the Rachel Ray set went on sale I bought them because my older Paula Dean set was old & showing grimy spots I couldn't wash off, the handles are extremely comfortable, they look amazing, cooking with them is great the heat is even though the pots & pans, next purchase will be the matching cookie sheets
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ann

customer_reviews.title: They dent easy
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful set . I love it and still love it even though they DENT easy . I will paste a picture . This one slipped out of my hands washing it and hit the counter - it dented just from hitting the counter , it didn’t fall , now the lid doesn’t fit good , but I still love the set .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok. The handle gets hot easily. Its difficult to clean, got to pay extra attention. After a few uses the bottom part turns black I need to scrub it. I dont think they'll last long. I've had this brand before, bought in a Department store. It is my perception that the quality of those from Amazon is not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love but was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There is no secret these are expensive atleast they are to me , I’ve had a few more sets prior and love her pots and pans but this last set the large pot lid doesn’t fit snug on it , but does the other pans so that tells me the large pot is buckled or something doesn’t wrong and it’s such a shame and let down bc I saved for these .
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Bent pot and hard to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I usually never leave reviews although This is an opportunity I don’t want to miss. I ordered these parts about three months ago and they were in boxes until about a few days ago. I wanted to open them in my new place unfortunately due to the corona I was not able to move. I open the boxes and discovered that one of the pots were bent. All the pots to cook the same putting the top on the pot does not work. I have to turn the pot upside down in order for it to seem the food properly it’s a hazard and hard to deal with. Other than that I really love the Rachael Ray cookware.
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set. The first set was lost by our movers (I think one of them took them home to the wife). Was probably the most disappointing thing lost in the move. They also lost our 55" T.V. this loss was worse. Bought a new set and will carry these in the car if we move again. You seriously must look at this set if you are looking for pan set. If they ever add a flat cast iron skillet to the set it would be one stop shopping for a novice cook. Better then the Pioneer Woman set our friend has.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I like my Rachael Ray pots and pans. However after about four years they do start to fall apart a little bit. Mostly the Teflon coating. However they're pretty durable and they are dishwasher safe although I normally wash my pots and pans by hand and put dishes and utensils in the dishwasher. And my girlfriend loves the color! Very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Christian in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I do alot of cooking. I do hope that they hold up over time but so far looks good. Food slides right out. Silicon grips are awesome. The way these were made is impressive as they have the handles and silicone grips tightly attached with no space for food to get stuck in. Silicone washers in glass top handles. Good sized and not heavy
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marisseau

customer_reviews.title: Value for what paid
customer_reviews.text: I have had my set less tgan 3 months. I have been VERY careful to clean rhem immeduately after cooking, including the bottoms. I do not put in the dishwasher and if not needed, no soap. I can most iften wipe them out. I use a soft, blue pad on bottoms to clean. I treat them gently based on the price. Good deal for what they cost. Would not recommend for a person who does not know how to be VERY careful with non-stick pans. Also, I never stack them inside of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Its not the best of Rachel Rays
customer_reviews.text: I have used Rachel Ray's set earlier too and I wanted to get a new set and got this one, but the quality is not matched. My old set lasted for about 3 years, this is not easy to clean, and food gets burnt very quickly even on a low flame. I have used all the pots, otherwise I would have been happy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Never Put in Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We bought them in November but did not use them till we move. In three weeks the red color in a red to pink. We don't need wash them every night do to not using them. We wash then two to three times a week but wash them by hand now. Very disappointed in the color retention. I would not but a Rachel Ray product again. She needs to check on her own products in her name. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: USA Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I have Rachael Ray pots and pans and when my son was getting his first home, I got him this to matches Decour. His kitchen is gray and he loves the color red. This is amazing and I was able to get all the pieces he needs as he is a cook who graduated in culinary school. He’s very particular about his pots and pans and has been very happy with this. Designed very well. Great value great color.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Barcia

customer_reviews.title: Warped?
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about all of my new pots & pans, the color is great and the product is nice. The only issue I have is the giant pot seems possibly warped. The lid will not stay closed on it which might be annoying when cooking. I'm not sure if it is something that will get better after used or not. Other than that, I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for this price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get a pots and pans set for my new house and I love teal so that caught my eye. When I used the product tho I am blown away! It really has all you need. Easy to clean, good sturdy handles, strong base, even heat distribution. I would highly recommend purchasing these. Only thing I won’t be doing is putting them in the dishwasher. While you absolutely can I don’t want them to wear out quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Giraldi

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality & easy to clrean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the wife to go with her new stove. The quality & performance is really great. We had pouched eggs & the residue stayed on the pot for 2 washings. They were shipped in the original box & was both fry pans got bent. Covers will NOT fit. This is the 3 time Amazon shipped in original boxes & were damaged. Paid good money for 2nd hand quality goods.
customer_reviews.author: John Miller

customer_reviews.title: PURE JUNK!!!!!!! DON'T BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought these about 3 months. The first two I was pleased. Recenlty I Had to throw away two pans because the non stick coating is peeling, which is already confirmed that can transfer chemicals into whatever you cook (by the way, we only use the dishwasher to clean it) . We cook every day so, it is important for us a good quality cookware. THIS ONE ISN'T. And the irritating part is that the same set is a lot cheaper (different color) at Walmart. DON'T BUY IT... DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is inexpensive cookware so don’t expect it to be high end but for my glass cooktop it is great. I actually have 2 sets and 2 comparable sets of Pioneer Wonan but I prefer and really like the RR better.
customer_reviews.author: Gele

customer_reviews.title: My favorite set yet
customer_reviews.text: I have always used cheaper sets which worked pretty okay, but didn't hold up very long and didn't always cook evenly. This set is durable, easy to clean (nothing sticks, burns onto it, and liquids bead right off), heat seems to distribute evenly, and the variety of sizes in the set accommodates anything I am cooking. I will have to wait and see how long they hold up, but so far I am a fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bartie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm so used to cooking for way over two people, that this set helps me to cut back. Just the right size for two people. You have to wash by hand which isn't a downer for me as l always did.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Totally dissatisfied at a glance
customer_reviews.text: My unboxing experience was of utmost disappointment. I choose the cranberry red, which showed a rich red at the base of the pot and faded into a lighter red. What I received was not close to that, I can't even give color to discribe what I received, but definitely it's not in the red family more the pink family and there's no kind of fading in color.
customer_reviews.author: Lips

customer_reviews.title: 10 qt. pot not in the set, nor steamer basket or attachment for double boiler.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely lightweight, easy to clean. But no double boiler, no steaming basket and needed to order a separate 10 qt. pot (same line) to complete all sizes needed. Nice product though. Good $ point.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Product shows scratches and wear after less than a week of use
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple uses, these pots are showing scratches. Both vertical and horizontal. These pots have only been hand washed too. Very disappointed with product quality. I would not recommend buying this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Horrible green color
customer_reviews.text: The description says lemon grass green and it’s very green. More like the 70’s avocado green or split pea it’s horrible. I will be returning it because I was looking for it to be yellow but of course pictures are deceptive
customer_reviews.author: lashell Y

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of pots and pans!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Rachel Ray pots and pans and I love these as much as I did the first set. They are durable, easy to clean and are fantastic to cook with. The purple color on these is also beautiful. Rachel clearly puts quality into her products - I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new set. I just started using them a couple weeks ago. They are beautiful and I'm very pleased! Based on other reviews and instructions, I'm choosing to only hand wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki K

customer_reviews.title: Last set was amazing, this set had been terrible with a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same set a year an half ago and used them for that long before they non stick surface started wear. I decided to get a replacement, because the previous set did so well. I’ve been incredible disappointed. The non-stick surface is already cracking. I don’t put them in the dishwasher, use silicone or wooden utensils in them and wash with a wash rag and not anything abrasive. I clean and use them the same way I did my previous set with completely different and terrible results! I’m frustrated I will have to purchase a new set after a month of use!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware set ever
customer_reviews.text: Best cookware set ever, After I bought the pots and pans I bought the bakeware set and then the utensil set! I can’t stop buying her things they’re great
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bajhart

customer_reviews.title: Not the same pans I once knew & loved :/
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to replace the same set I’ve been using for over the last 5 years. I’ve always LOVED these pans- no issues ever to this point! This new set is a gorgeous shade of blue but ALL of the pans are warped/bowed in a way that pan lids don’t sit flat & allow some steam to escape (NOT what you want when cooking rice or pasta!). Unfortunately I opened & discarded all packaging before I realized these pans are defective. Had they not already been in use when I discovered their flaws, I would have returned instantly!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Pree

customer_reviews.title: I love the color so much
customer_reviews.text: I love the color so much, in love with them but they do get scratched super quickly. I only cook with silicone utensils and somehow there are very noticeable scratches on them but then again the price is very reasonable so can't expect them to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great quality. Great value
customer_reviews.text: I had tried Rachel Ray pans at a friends house and was extremely impressed by the quality, so I bought an entire brand new set for my apartment. This set is great value for the money! It’s sturdy, but not heavy. This set is perfect, and have yet to feel like we needed to buy any missing size. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Oh Family

customer_reviews.title: Color not as Shown
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine. I just received them. I have not used them yet. The problem is the color was not what was shown. They were supposed to be Sea Salt Gray (bluish gray), but they were just a light gray.
customer_reviews.author: VLRyman

customer_reviews.title: Garbage don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: This set looks amazing when you take it out of the box, I ignored the bad reviews about the bottom melting off and some would have holes burn through the bottom. I followed all care instructions, the first pan I use, on low/medium heat for not even 10 minutes and part of the color had bubbled and started to melt through the bottom! DON'T BUY THESE ARE EXPENSIVE GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pea green, not yellow
customer_reviews.text: Discolors over time and not dishwasher safe. This is the third set we've had as the colors fade from heat. The lemongrass green just arrived in the mail, and the color looks more like pea soup than yellow like the picture shows. I didn't read the name when I ordered, I used the picture as reference.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Sooo....the glass just shattered.
customer_reviews.text: This just happened like 5 min ago, as you can see...I was simply steaming broccoli at a medium temp setting...and the glass shattered 5 min into the boil. I wouldn't go through this much trouble to write a bad review for spite...I'm actually trying to warn people. Now I have to go clean up all this glass....good luck in your shopping for pots and pans, I hope you learned from my mistake...go elsewhere. Thanks for you time.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Koffman

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color I'm in to red so I haven't used my Rachael Ray Pots and Pans yet put just looking at the box I know I'm going to love cooking on them.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: There were mixed reviews on this product, I still decided to purchase them. When they arrived the box was open. Pan are thin and cheaply made. I am very disappointed with this set. I haven't decided if I'm going to return them, I haven't even used them yet. I have purchased better pans at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Nenita Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are a good deal if you can get on sale. Not great quality. They stain easily. Especially the utensils that come with it. I make Kraft Mac n cheese, stir it with the spoon and it turned a yellow green color.
customer_reviews.author: Mallary Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst set ever! I bought this a month and a half ago and i use them very lightly and carefully. I only hand wash them and uae wooden utensils when i cook in them. Today after cooking in them out of nowhere the dark coating just started coming off and the side of the pot became dented which makes me think these pots don’t handle heat very well. Very disappointed, not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids are not sturdy and easy to bend
customer_reviews.text: I like using the pots and pants , I like the color and how light and easy they are to use . I don’t like the durability of the lids , one of the lids bend on the corner after one day of using , I didn’t drop it and I hand wash it . Wish it was more sturdy seems to easy to bend with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. 1. The pans flaked the 2nd time I used them. I was super careful with them, hoping to keep the non-stick pans in the best shape. The protective cover still flaked off. 2. I hand wash the pans. I washed a skillet and placed it on the counter, it slid off and the pan is now lop-sided. 3. The buttoms of the pans are burnt. Am I the only one that thinks this is ridiculous for the amount I paid for them?
customer_reviews.author: Seth Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for a starter kitchen and not a big cook. A real cook would not be happy. Thin and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: HawaiiNan

customer_reviews.title: Item came quickly & wrapped up very well!
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this product was the price! I bought it for my daughter & she was extremely happy with it. Loves the color & she loves to cook in it. She hasn't had any complaints what so ever, so I know if there was a problem she would let me know. I just might order it for myself. If youre looking to buy a great product to cook in well this is it! The money spent is well worth it. Go out & buy it for a friend, family member or even as a wedding gift! You won't regret the purchase & your friend or family member will love you(even more) for it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of pans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the purple set..sort of wish i had ordered the lemongrass color now...i like them..but if i had to do it again, i would go with dishwasher safe..but ive had them 10 months and they are holding up rather well..a few scratches due to using a fork..ooops...but well worth the money....a decent set for a decent price....
customer_reviews.author: Dcorderoreyes

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap! Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Rachael Ray for years and have to say this purchase was a complete disaster. All the pots in the set were so dented that the lids didn't sit on them at all. I don't believe this happened during shipping; the product itself is so flimsy and cheap that I could bend the cookware myself with my own hands. It's definitely not durable or worth the money. Not to mention the two frying pans were missing from the box. For the money, you can definitely buy better. This was such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not for glass ceramic stove tops.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice that is as far as we got, looking at them. After unpacking we found the instructions which state these are not recommended for glass ceramic stove tops because the could fuse to the top! The item description says for use on all stove tops. These are going back.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R

customer_reviews.title: ... this set a few days but so far I love them! I put them to use right away ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this set a few days but so far I love them! I put them to use right away and made up some freezer meals for family today, I made a batch of eggs with no oils!!! always a plus! cleanup was a breeze and the color complimented my kitchen really well. The only thing I didn't pay attention to as normal with buying a set was the size of the frying pans I will be wanting to purchase the 12" skillet soon. Overall I'm really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grip
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the gas stove life and the pans I had did not do too well and I would burn my hand moving the pan off the burner... My own mistake of course, but these pans.... Their lovely rubber handles keep my hands burn free. Also their nonstick-ness is incredible! Helps with healthier cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Nalani

customer_reviews.title: Decent pots and pans. But....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in May 2020. I just used the large pot for the first time today. It is bent out of shape. The lid will not fit. Screwed again. And no way to resolve this issue. Be sure to make sure the lids fit correctly. Screwed Again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and gorgeous color!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a similar set that lasted 7 years and we wanted to get the same set in a new color (Blue agave) which looked better even in person; my cat Penelope apparently likes it as well, as I caught her sitting in one of the pots.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this set, had it in my cart for a while kept shopping around but couldn't quite settle on one I love like I did this one, so I ended up just buying it and I don't regret it at all. The set is amazing, super easy to clean NOTHING sticks to the pans it just slides right off. I also bought the cooking tray set and those are awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Milanne

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and the non-stick coating is holding up
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and the non-stick coating is holding up. My only complaint is that the handles on the pot and pans get hot even though they have some kind of insulation coating on them. I have to use pot holders when using these.
customer_reviews.author: nutz4pugz

customer_reviews.title: Daugter loves this set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these for myself a couple of years ago. My daughter wanted her own set of cookware so I bought her this set for Christmas. She is so happy with them. These are durable and nice to look at. Would recommend to anyone looking for a new set of cookware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gorgeous set; I just didn’t realize that it was not dishwasher safe. With a bigger family I don’t have time to stand over the sink for an hour washing pots and pans, so I’ll be returning these and going with a different brand that is bolder in color, eco-friendly, AND dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So glad I went with this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to go with a different brand but decided to go with this and I’m so glad I did! These are great for making eggs and other things that stick. Super easy to clean and even in the dishwasher they come out nice. Really pleased with the modern color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie S.

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Cucina Nonstick Cookware Pots and Pans Set, 12 Piece, Pumpkin Orange
product_meta.description: Color:Pumpkin Orange| Style Name:Cookware SetGet high performance and durability in the kitchen with the Rachael Ray Cucina Hard Enamel 12-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set. Crafted with sturdy hard enamel porcelain exteriors and durable aluminum construction that promotes fast, even heating, these versatile pots and pans incorporate the easy-to-use functionality and time-saving solutions Rachael is known for. Color meets convenience with the distinctive espresso-colored, PFOA-free nonstick that releases foods effortlessly, complements the exteriors, and cleans up easily. Rubberized stainless steel handles on the cooking set are dual riveted for added strength, and shatter-resistant glass lids seal in heat and flavor. Oven safe to 400°F, the nonstick cookware is a welcome addition to other cookware and serveware pieces in the Rachael Ray Cucina collection. Prepare delectable dishes for loved ones with the warm and rustic-styled nonstick cookware in the Rachael Ray Cucina 12-Piece Hard Enamel Nonstick Cookware Set
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES: 1-Quart and 3-Quart Saucepans with Lids, 6-Quart Stockpot with Lid, 8.5-Inch and 10-Inch Frying Pans, 3-Quart Sauté Pan with Lid, Slotted Turner and Spoon
DURABLE NONSTICK COOKWARE DESIGN: Nonstick pots and pans are crafted with durable aluminum and sturdy hard enamel porcelain exteriors
ENHANCED PFOA-FREE NONSTICK: Cookware set features espresso-colored, PFOA-free nonstick for effortless food release
CONVENIENCE AND CONTROL: The 12-piece cookware set boasts dual-riveted rubberized stainless steel handles and shatter-resistant glass lids; includes slotted turner and spoon
OVEN SAFE: Oven safe to 400°F, the pots and pans are suitable for all stovetops, except induction
RUSTIC COLORS AND MODERN DESIGN: Rachael Ray Cucina Cookware features rustic colors and modern design that fuses relaxed style and everyday functionality

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,650 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
